column5: Decided to buy myself a little Christmas present. Got a bunch of accessories on the way to accompany the little bugger too including a Samsung Tab S2 for visual duty. Will be better than the phone I'm sure. Can't wait to have aerial images of ye olde cabin.  ; )
Wont be long until you spot bigfoot way up there lol.

Just don't be dive bombing any float-planes. LOL Would be nice to see some overhead views of your place. Been following the build thread since you started it. Sorry bud if you thought you bought this for yourself; wrong, its for us to follow along. Enjoy and show us your flying skills. Dan.
Had to fix it up Dan.
